name: The Impure
description: They looks same, just like they see us. The coastal city was teared down by earthquake and tidal wave caused by it. A group of black square creatures, was rescuing their brothers and sisters in the ruins day and night with all their efforts, even with their lives.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
